reviews.review_msg: Bryan is a kind professor who will offer any help to see you succeed. He is lenient on due dates and his exams are quite easy with open-ended essay questions. If you know the readings you'll do fine. His lectures can be boring and are often unrelated, so you could do without attending. Tutorials are mandatory but help you keep up with the content.

His lectures are not very engaging and honestly pointless. He talks a lot without really saying anything relevant to the coursework. If you read the chapter and take good notes about the main points/examples of the chapters then you'll do well. It's basically just a self-taught class with a mandatory tutorial. My TA was great though!
